caption.p: Immunoperoxidase monolayer assay (IPMA) showing the inhibition of PRRSV infection in MARC-145 cells by Tiliacora triandra (TT) extract at concentrations of 312.5, 625, and 1250 μg/ml ( a–d) and P. emblica (PE) extract at concentrations of 19.5, 39, and 78 μg/ml ( e–h). Scale bar in the figure: 200 μm
